00048 class CustomNonbondedForceImpl : public ForceImpl {
00049 public:
00050     CustomNonbondedForceImpl(CustomNonbondedForce& owner);
00051     ~CustomNonbondedForceImpl();

00053     CustomNonbondedForce& getOwner() {
00054         return owner;
00055     }
00056     void updateContextState(ContextImpl& context) {
00057         // This force field doesn't update the state directly.
00058     }
00059     double calcForcesAndEnergy(ContextImpl& context, bool includeForces, bool includeEnergy, int groups);
00060     std::map<std::string, double> getDefaultParameters();
00061     std::vector<std::string> getKernelNames();
00062 private:
00063     CustomNonbondedForce& owner;
00064     Kernel kernel;
00065 };
